name: uretail_ui
description: isomorphic web app for uretail ui.
author: fangqg@yonyou.com

scripts.debug:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=development MDF_LANG=true NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --progress --colors  --config webpack.config.js
scripts.debug:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=daily  nodemon -w src/web/server -w src/web/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/web/server/index.js
scripts.debug:server:devdb: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true NODE_ENV=development SRV_URL=http://10.10.2.59:8000 PRINT_SERVER=http://uretailserver.yonyouup.com/print_service nodemon -w src/web/server -w src/web/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/web/server/index.js
scripts.debug:server:testdb: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true NODE_ENV=development SRV_URL=http://10.10.13.69:8000 PRINT_SERVER=http://uretailserver.yonyouup.com/print_service nodemon -w src/web/server -w src/web/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/web/server/index.js
scripts.build:dll: npm run build:dll:dev && npm run build:dll:prod
scripts.build:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true babel src -d bin --ignore src/web/client,src/business && echo '后端程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true NODE_ENV=production ZIP=true webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:client:max: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true NODE_ENV=production ZIP=true node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：编译完成'
scripts.package: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true webpack --config webpack.package.config.js --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：打包完成'
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:support: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run support:withReact && npm run support:withoutReact
scripts.support:withoutReact: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true webpack --config webpack.support.withoutReact.config --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：打包完成'
scripts.support:withReact: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true webpack --config webpack.support.withReact.config --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：打包完成'
scripts.auth: npm run build:server && npm run auth:client
scripts.auth:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production MDF_LANG=true BUILD_TYPE=auth webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：编译完成'
scripts.debug:auth: cross-env BABEL_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development MDF_LANG=true BUILD_TYPE=auth webpack-dev-server --colors  --config webpack.config.js
